title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 805.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 805.1 - Application

State Regulations

An affected employee or authorized employee representative
may contest the abatement period prescribed in the notice of violation and
order to comply by filing an employee contest petition when such person has
reason to believe that the abatement period is unreasonable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
805.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
